description: This file defines the IPCHelper class, which provides static utility methods for simplifying Inter-Process Communication (IPC) requests, including common send, get, and set operations for data types like int, long, double, boolean, and string.

classes.name: IPCHelper
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods to perform common IPC operations such as sending messages and retrieving or setting various primitive data types.

methods.name: simpleSend
methods.description: Sends a simple IPC request with no input or output, returning success status.

methods.name: simpleGetInt
methods.description: Performs an IPC request expecting an Integer result.

methods.name: simpleSetInt
methods.description: Performs an IPC request to set an Integer value.

methods.name: simpleGetLong
methods.description: Performs an IPC request expecting a Long result.

methods.name: simpleSetLong
methods.description: Performs an IPC request to set a Long value.

methods.name: simpleGetDouble
methods.description: Performs an IPC request expecting a Double result.

methods.name: simpleSetDouble
methods.description: Performs an IPC request to set a Double value.

methods.name: simpleGetBoolean
methods.description: Performs an IPC request expecting a Boolean result.

methods.name: simpleSetBoolean
methods.description: Performs an IPC request to set a Boolean value.

methods.name: simpleGetString
methods.description: Performs an IPC request expecting a String result.

methods.name: simpleSetString
methods.description: Performs an IPC request to set a String value.
